price: 36. Ou ont-ils (eux-mêmes) créé les cieux et la terre ? Non, ils n’ont aucune certitude.
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: am khalaqū al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bal lā yūqinūna
